text: Yam Ski Resort, also calls Payam Ski Resort, is a ski resort in Marand in North of Tabriz, East Azerbaijan, Iran operated by East Azerbaijan Province Ski Federation. The resort is located in the northern foothills of Mishodaghi. It is one of the oldest ski resorts in Iran that still operating. The resort have a ski lift. Ski season in Yam resort depends on winter precipitation each year which normally starts in January and continues till end of March.Nasr news, Payam is one of the oldest ski resorts in Iran |http://www.nasrnews.ir/News/tabid/243/ArticleID/26730/%D9%BE%D9%8A%D8%B3%D8%AA-%D8%A7%D8%B3%DA%A9%D9%8A-%D9%BE%D9%8A%D8%A7%D9%85-%D9%85%D8%B1%D9%86%D8%AF-%D8%A7%D8%B2-%D9%82%D8%AF%D9%8A%D9%85%D9%8A-%D8%AA%D8%B1%D9%8A%D9%86-%D9%BE%D9%8A%D8%B3%D8%AA-%D9%87%D8%A7%D9%8A-%D8%A7%D8%B3%DA%A9%D9%8A-%DA%A9%D8%B4%D9%88%D8%B1 This resort also considered a summer resort and attracts visitors from nearby cities. ==External links== * Official web site of Pyam ski resort * An Azerbaijani introduction to Payam Ski Resort ==References== Category:Ski areas and resorts in Iran Category:Sports venues in Tabriz
title: Yam Ski Resort
